warscrolls.name: Alarielle the Everqueen
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (3), Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Wardroth’s Great Antlers** is 4.

abilities.name: Living Battering Ram
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Rite of Life
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH** unit that has been destroyed to be the target. This unit can use this ability if it has been destroyed, but if it does, this unit must be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 9" of a friendly **Awakened Wyldwood** and more than 9" from all enemy units. If the target was a **MONSTER**, allocate 6 damage points to the replacement unit (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict 2D3 mortal damage on the target. If the target is destroyed by this spell, you can immediately resolve the effect of the ‘Treesong’ spell as if this unit had successfully cast it.

abilities.name: Lifebloom
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:
• Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit for the rest of the turn.
• **Heal (2D3)** this unit.

warscrolls.name: Arch-Revenant
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Fly, Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Champion of Kurnoth
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **KURNOTHI** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Crescent Shield
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply to this unit for the rest of the turn:

***Defensive Stance:*** This unit has **WARD (4+)**.

***Aggressive Stance:*** Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons, and add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s combat attacks.

warscrolls.name: Awakened Wyldwood
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Ward (5+), Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Vengeful Forest Spirits
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit within this terrain feature’s combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 4+, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Overgrown Wilderness
abilities.effect: Enemy units are visible to friendly **SYLVANETH** units even if every model in that enemy unit is within 1" of this terrain feature. In addition, the Range characteristic of friendly **SYLVANETH** units’ ranged weapons is not halved while every model in that friendly unit is within 1" of this terrain feature.

abilities.name: Growing Woods
abilities.effect:
Each time you set up an **Awakened Wyldwood**, you can place 1-3 scenery pieces (Terrain, 1.7). If you place more than 1 scenery piece, the tips at the end of each base must touch, forming a circle. The area inside this circle is considered to be part of this terrain feature. For each additional scenery piece in this terrain feature that is placed after the first:

• Add 2 to the Health characteristic of this terrain feature.
• Increase the range of friendly abilities that require friendly models to be wholly within 6" of this terrain feature by 3".

abilities.name: Deploy Wyldwood
abilities.effect: Set up this terrain feature wholly within friendly territory, more than 3" from all objectives and other terrain features. This terrain feature has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Belthanos, First Thorn of Kurnoth
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Fly, Order, Sylvaneth, Kurnothi

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Carnelian Greatspite’s Razor-like Mandibles** is 3.

abilities.name: Kurnothi War-horn
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **SYLVANETH** units to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, each target can use **CHARGE** abilities even if they used a **RUN** ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Rhythm of the Chase
abilities.phaseDetails: Once per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll, then you can remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield within 1" of the target.

abilities.name: Nature Aetheric
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Start of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, the target gains the ‘Place of Power’ terrain ability (Terrain 1.2) and counts as a friendly **Awakened Wyldwood** for the purposes of the ‘Endless Growth’, ‘Walk the Hidden Paths’ and ‘Strike and Fade’ abilities.

warscrolls.name: Branchwych
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Fury of the Forest
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit is wholly within 6" of any friendly **Awakened Wyldwoods**, pick a friendly **SYLVANETH** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Dryads
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Blessings of The Forest
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks that target this unit while it is wholly within 6" of any friendly **Awakened Wyldwoods**.

warscrolls.name: Drycha Hamadreth
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Primal Terror
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, halve the target’s control score (rounding up) for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Song of Spite
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit within 12" of the caster to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
The following effects apply for the rest of the turn:

Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **SYLVANETH** units that target that enemy unit.

In addition, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **Spite-Revenants** or **The Twistweald** units that target that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Mercurial Aspect
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Any Hero Phase
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply to this unit for the rest of the turn:

***Enraged:*** Add 10 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Flitterfuries**.

***Embittered:*** Add 10 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Swarm of Squirmlings**.

warscrolls.name: Gladewyrm
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Burrow Below
abilities.effect: If this **MANIFESTATION** is not in combat, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy non‑**WIZARD** units and more than 3" from all enemy **WIZARDS**.

abilities.name: Feed on Eldritch Energy
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **WIZARD** in combat with this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from casting rolls, unbinding rolls and banishment rolls for the target until the end of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Gossamid Archers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Fly, Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Zephyrspites
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Any Shooting Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit used a **SHOOT** ability this phase, this unit can move D6". It cannot end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Forest Fighters
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Kelthannor, the Forest Prince
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Cavalry, Order, Sylvaneth, Kurnothi

abilities.name: Debilitating Shot
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that has no more than 1 model and that had any damage points allocated to it this phase by this unit’s shooting attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Clarion of the Forest Prince
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**WAR MACHINE** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target can move 3". It can move through and end that move within the combat ranges of enemy units that it was in combat with at the start of that move, but not those of other enemy units. It does not have to end the move in combat.

warscrolls.name: Kurnoth Hunters with Kurnoth Greatbows
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Sylvaneth, Kurnothi

abilities.name: Envoys of the Everqueen
abilities.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective, friendly **SYLVANETH** units contesting that objective have **WARD (6+)**.

abilities.name: Steady Aim
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can ignore the effects of the ‘Guarded Hero’ ability (Core Rules, 25.0) when picking targets for its shooting attacks.

warscrolls.name: Kurnoth Hunters with Kurnoth Greatswords
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Sylvaneth, Kurnothi

abilities.name: Envoys of the Everqueen
abilities.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective, friendly **SYLVANETH** units contesting that objective have **WARD (6+)**.

abilities.name: Trample Underfoot
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit that is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Kurnoth Hunters with Kurnoth Scythes
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Sylvaneth, Kurnothi

abilities.name: Envoys of the Everqueen
abilities.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective, friendly **SYLVANETH** units contesting that objective have **WARD (6+)**.

abilities.name: Tanglethorn Thicket
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Kurnoth’s Heralds
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Cavalry, Champion, Order, Sylvaneth, Kurnothi

abilities.name: Graceful Leaps
abilities.effect:
Each time this unit makes a pile-in move:
• Add 3" to the distance this unit can move.
• This unit can pass through models in enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Revenant Seekers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Fly, Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Thrumming With Life
abilities.effect: **Heal (3)** this unit.

abilities.name: Harvesters of the Lamentiri
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly unit wholly within 12" of any friendly **Revenant Seekers** units uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

abilities.name: Forest Fighters
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Drycha Hamadreth
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Twisted Spirit-Song
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **SYLVANETH** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks, including those made with **Companion** weapons.

In addition, if the target is non-**KURNOTHI**, add 1 to the Attacks characteristics of the target’s melee weapons.

abilities.name: Strength from Spite
abilities.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for damage points inflicted by this unit’s attacks.

abilities.name: Vicious Spiteswarms
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a CHARGE ability for a unit within 18" of this unit
abilities.effect:
Your opponent must pick 1 of the following:

***Avoid the Swarm:*** Subtract D3 from the charge roll. In addition, if your opponent re-rolls that charge roll, subtract D3 from that roll.

***Charge Through the Swarm:*** Subtract 1 from hit rolls for that unit’s attacks for the rest of the turn, and add 1 to hit rolls for attacks that target that unit for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Revenant Seekers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Fly, Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Lamentiri Life Energies
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **SYLVANETH** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Forest Fighters
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Skaeth's Wild Hunt
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Order, Sylvaneth, Kurnothi

abilities.name: Fleet of Foot
abilities.effect: This unit can use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Karthaen
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Karthaen**, **Huntcaller**, is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Spirit of Durthu
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Guardian Sword** is 3.

abilities.name: Titanic Duel
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Wrathful Guardian
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s combat attacks while the target is within 3" of an **Awakened Wyldwood**.

warscrolls.name: Spite-Revenants
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Unbridled Malice
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Spiterider Lancers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Fly, Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Thrumming with Life
abilities.effect: **Heal (3)** this unit.

abilities.name: Descent of the Spiteriders
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Forest Fighters
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Spiteswarm Hive
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: The Hive Nourishes
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **SYLVANETH** unit within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply to the target for the rest of the turn:

***Vital Venoms:*** Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for the target.

***Shielding Swarm:*** The target has **WARD (6+)**.

warscrolls.name: The Lady of Vines
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Aspect of the Everqueen
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, friendly **SYLVANETH** units have **WARD (5+)** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Writhing Vines
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply for the rest of the turn:

***Barrier:*** Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks.

***Ensnare:*** Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly units that target that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Verdian Crown
abilities.effect: This unit counts as an **Awakened Wyldwood** for the purposes of the ‘Endless Growth’, ‘Walk the Hidden Paths’ and ‘Strike and Fade’ abilities.

warscrolls.name: The Twistweald
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/8), Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Eruption of Thorned Vines
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Movement Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit is more than 6" from all other friendly **SYLVANETH** units, pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Subtract D3 from charge rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Tree-Revenants
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Waypiper's Dance
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, remove it from the battlefield, and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Treelord
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Sweeping Blows** is 3.

abilities.name: Lash and Tangle
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Entangling Grasp
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by attacks made with this unit’s **Strangleroots** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use **RUN** or **RETREAT** abilities until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Treelord Ancient
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Sweeping Blows** is 3.

abilities.name: Groundshaker
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Awakening the Wood
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **Awakened Wyldwood** wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage equal to the roll on each enemy unit within the target’s combat range.

warscrolls.name: Vengeful Skullroot
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Vengeful Terrors
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, subtract an amount from the target’s control score equal to the number of friendly units that have been destroyed this battle (not including **MANIFESTATIONS** or **FACTION TERRAIN**).

abilities.name: Creeping Willow
abilities.effect: This **MANIFESTATION** counts as an **Awakened Wyldwood** for the purposes of the ‘Endless Growth’, ‘Walk the Hidden Paths’ and ‘Strike and Fade’ abilities.

warscrolls.name: Warsong Revenant
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (2), Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Alarielle's Song
abilities.effect: Friendly **SYLVANETH** units have **WARD (6+)** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit. Subtract 1 from ward rolls for enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Unleash Swarm of Spites
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Awakened Wyldwood** wholly within 18" of this unit, pick up to 3 visible enemy units within 9" of that terrain feature to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Wyldwood Revenants
abilities.effect: Add 1 to unbinding rolls and banishment rolls for this unit while it is wholly within 6" of any **Awakened Wyldwoods**.

warscrolls.name: Ylthari's Guardians
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Order, Sylvaneth

abilities.name: Bitterness of the Soul
abilities.effect:
Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Enchanted Glade Weapons** for each model in this unit that is slain.

**Designer’s Note:** *Models that have been slain and returned to this unit do not count as being slain for the purposes of this ability.*

abilities.name: Ylthari
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Ylthari** is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**.

rules.name: Healing Song
rules.effect: When using the ‘Endless Growth’ ability, friendly **SYLVANETH MONSTERS** can **Heal (3)** instead of **Heal (D3)**.

rules.name: Stirring Life
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
rules.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO SYLVANETH** unit within 3" of a terrain feature to be the target.
rules.effect:
If the target has a Health characteristic of 1, return up to 3 slain models to the target. If the target has a Health characteristic of 2 or more, roll a dice, then pick 1 of the following:
• **Heal (X)** the target, where **X** is equal to the roll.
• Return a number of slain models to the target with a combined Health characteristic that is equal to or less than the roll.

rules.name: The Terror in the Eaves
rules.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with friendly **SYLVANETH** units.

rules.name: Fleet and Swift
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH CAVALRY** unit to use this ability.
rules.effect: This unit can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** ability this turn.

rules.name: Lacerating Strike
rules.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **SYLVANETH** non-**KURNOTHI INFANTRY** units that charged in the same turn.

rules.name: Duskwalk
rules.effect: Friendly **SYLVANETH HEROES** can use the ‘Walk the Hidden Paths’ ability even if it has been used by another friendly unit in the same phase.

spells.name: Wrathful Spirits
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a friendly **Awakened Wyldwood** wholly within 18" of the caster to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **SYLVANETH** units while they are wholly within 6" of the target.

spells.name: The Dwellers Below
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit that is either within 12" of this unit or within 6" of an **Awakened** **Wyldwood** to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target unit.

spells.name: Treesong
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: If there are fewer than 3 friendly **Awakened Wyldwoods** on the battlefield, you can set up an **Awakened Wyldwood** wholly within 24" of the caster, more than 3" from all objectives and more than 1" from all enemy units and other terrain features. If there are already 3 friendly **Awakened** **Wyldwoods** on the battlefield, **Heal (3)** each friendly **Awakened Wyldwood**.

spells.name: Summon Gladewyrm
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Gladewyrm** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SYLVANETH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Gladewyrm** wholly within 12" of and visible to the caster, and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Spiteswarm Hive
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Spiteswarm Hive** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SYLVANETH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Spiteswarm Hive** wholly within 18" of and visible to the caster, and more than 3" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Vengeful Skullroot
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Vengeful Skullroot** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SYLVANETH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Vengeful Skullroot** wholly within 12" of and visible to the caster, and more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts.name: Heartwood Hunting Horn
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Hero Phase

artefacts.name: Seed of Rebirth
artefacts.effect: If this unit would be destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit is not destroyed and any remaining damage points inflicted on it have no effect. Then, **Heal (1)** this unit. This unit cannot use this ability again for the rest of the battle.

artefacts.name: Greenwood Gladius
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

artefacts.name: Crown of Fell Bowers
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Roll a dice. On 3+, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **SYLVANETH** units that target that enemy unit this phase.

artefacts.name: Glamourweave
artefacts.effect: Each phase, you can re-roll 1 hit roll, 1 wound roll and 1 save roll for this unit.

artefacts.name: Acorn of the Ages
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
artefacts.effect: If there are fewer than 3 friendly **Awakened Wyldwoods** on the battlefield, set up an **Awakened Wyldwood** wholly within 12" of this unit, more than 3" from all objectives and more than 1" from all enemy units and other terrain features.

artefacts.name: Ranu's Lamentiri
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability for a unit within 30" of this unit
artefacts.effect: Make an unbinding roll of 2D6. If the roll exceeds the casting roll for the spell, the spell is unbound and its effect is not resolved. Then, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the caster equal to the difference between the casting roll and the unbinding roll, to a maximum of 6.

heroicTraits.name: Sapwood Leader
heroicTraits.effect: If you pick this unit to be a target of the 'Abundant Growth’ ability, **Heal (3)** this unit instead of **Heal (1)**.

heroicTraits.name: Warsinger
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of the target for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Radiant Spirit
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL or PRAYER ability
heroicTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell or prayer on that unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per **SPELL** or **PRAYER** ability.

heroicTraits.name: Spellsinger
heroicTraits.effect:
While this unit is within the combat range of an **Awakened** **Wyldwood**:

If this unit is a **WIZARD**, add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

If this unit is not a **WIZARD**, it has **WIZARD (1)** instead.

other.name: Ominous Fog
other.effect: Units in this Regiment of Renown are not visible to enemy units more than 12" from them while they are wholly within 9" of the **Treelord** in this Regiment of Renown.

other.name: Endless Wandering
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Hero Phase
other.declare: Pick a unit in this Regiment of Renown that is not in combat to use this ability.
other.effect: That unit can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

other.name: Gossamid Champion
other.declare: Pick the **Arch-Revenant** in this Regiment of Renown to use this ability, the pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target.
other.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract X from charge rolls for the target, where X is the number of damage points allocated to the target this phase by shooting attacks made by the **Gossamid Archers** unit in the Regiment of Renown, to a maximum of 6.

other.name: Flight of the Zephyrspites
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
other.effect: If both units in this Regiment of Renown are within each other’s combat range and neither unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, remove both units from the battlefield, then set them up again within each other’s combat range, wholly within 3" of a terrain feature and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Abundant Growth
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick each friendly **EVERGREEN HUNT** unit that is wholly within 3" of a terrain feature to be the targets.

battleTraits.name: Merciful Strike
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **EVERGREEN HUNT MONSTER** that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice and add the number of damage points the target has. If the result exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

battleTraits.name: A Prize Quarry is Sighted
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 9" of a friendly **EVERGREEN HUNT** unit to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: The target becomes the **quarry** for the rest of the battle. If there was already a **quarry** on the battlefield when you declared this ability, that unit is no longer the **quarry**.

battleTraits.name: Rhythm of the Chase
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.declare: If there is no **quarry** on the battlefield, pick an enemy unit on the battlefield to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: The target is the **quarry** for the rest of the battle.

battleTraits.name: Opening Horn Blast
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.declare: You must use this ability at the start of the battle round.
battleTraits.effect:
Your chords are reset to 0. Then, you gain 1 **chord**:

• If a friendly **Belthanos** is on the battlefield.
• For each friendly **EVERGREEN HUNT** unit that is wholly within the same large quarter of the battlefield as the quarry.
• For each quarry destroyed so far during the battle.

battleTraits.name: Song of the Hunt
battleTraits.effect:
The following cumulative effects apply to friendly **EVERGREEN HUNT** units depending on the number of **chords** you have:

**1 chord – *Simple***: Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for friendly units wholly within the same quarter of the battlefield as the quarry.

**2 chords – *Tuneful***: Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for friendly units’ combat attacks that target an enemy unit wholly within the same quarter of the battlefield as the quarry.

**3-5 chords – *Melodic***: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly units while they are in combat with the quarry.

**6+ chords – *Mellifluous***: While a friendly unit is in combat with the quarry, the quarry has **STRIKE-LAST**.

battleTraits.name: Endless Growth
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.declare: Pick any number of friendly **SYLVANETH** units wholly within 6" of any friendly **Awakened Wyldwoods** to be the targets.

battleTraits.name: Strike and Fade
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH** unit that is in combat and is wholly within 6"of a friendly **Awakened Wyldwood** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units and wholly within 6" of a different friendly **Awakened Wyldwood**.

battleTraits.name: Walk the Hidden Paths
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **SYLVANETH** unit that is not in combat and is wholly within 6" of a friendly **Awakened Wyldwood** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units and wholly within 6" of a different friendly **Awakened Wyldwood**.
